00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "odldef.h"
00019 #include "odlinter.h"
00020 #include <errno.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 
00040 MTKt_status MtkFileCoreMetaDataGet(
00041   const char *filename, 
00042   const char *param, 
00043   MtkCoreMetaData *metadata   )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00046   MTKt_status status;
00047   int32 hdf_status;        /* HDF-EOS return status */
00048   int32 sd_id = FAIL;      /* HDF SD file identifier. */
00049 
00050   if (filename == NULL)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00052 
00053   /* Open HDF File */
00054   hdf_status = sd_id = SDstart(filename, DFACC_READ);
00055   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDSTART_FAILED);
00057 
00058   /* Read coremetadata. */
00059   status = MtkFileCoreMetaDataGetFid(sd_id, param, metadata);
00060   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00061 
00062   /* Close HDF File */
00063   hdf_status = SDend(sd_id);
00064   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDEND_FAILED);
00066   sd_id = FAIL;
00067 
00068   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00069 
00070 ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   if (sd_id != FAIL)
00072     SDend(sd_id);
00073 
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
00076 
00082 MTKt_status MtkFileCoreMetaDataGetFid(
00083   int32 sd_id,       
00084   const char *param, 
00085   MtkCoreMetaData *metadata   )
00086 {
00087   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00088   MTKt_status status;
00089   char *coremeta = NULL;
00090   FILE *temp = NULL;
00091 #ifdef _WIN32
00092   char *temp_file_name;
00093 #endif
00094   MtkCoreMetaData md = MTK_CORE_METADATA_INIT;
00095 
00096   AGGREGATE aggNode = NULL;
00097   GROUP grpNode = NULL;
00098   OBJECT objNode = NULL;
00099   PARAMETER parmNode = NULL;
00100     VALUE valueNode = NULL;
00101   char **strPtr1 = NULL;
00102   int *intPtr = NULL;
00103   double *dblPtr = NULL;
00104   int odlRetVal = 0;  /* ODl function return value */
00105 
00106   if (param == NULL || metadata == NULL)
00107     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00108 
00109   /* clear the errno for the ODL routines */
00110   if (errno == ERANGE)
00111   {
00112       errno = 0;
00113   }
00114     
00115   /* attributes are contained in a separate file */
00116   aggNode = NewAggregate(aggNode, KA_GROUP, "locAggr", "");
00117   if (aggNode == NULL)
00118   {
00119     printf("Unable to create odl aggregate locAggr\n");
00120     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00121   }
00122 
00123   /* Read core metadata from HDF file */
00124   status = MtkFileCoreMetaDataRawFid(sd_id, &coremeta);
00125   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00126 
00127   /* ODL parser requires input from a FILE */
00128   #ifdef _WIN32
00129      /* On Win32 tmpfile() creates a file in the root directory, */
00130      /* the user may not have write access.*/
00131      temp_file_name = _tempnam(NULL, NULL);
00132      temp = fopen(temp_file_name, "w+");
00133   #else
00134      temp = tmpfile();
00135   #endif
00136   
00137   if (temp == NULL)
00138      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00139 
00140   fprintf(temp,"%s",coremeta);
00141   rewind(temp);
00142 
00143   free(coremeta);
00144   coremeta = NULL;
00145 
00146   odlRetVal = ReadLabel(temp, aggNode);
00147   if (odlRetVal != 1)
00148   {
00149     printf("Unable to convert to an odl structure\n");
00150     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00151   }
00152 
00153   fclose(temp);
00154   temp = NULL;
00155 
00156   /* extract the values and dump in the buffer provided */
00157   grpNode = FindGroup(aggNode, "INVENTORYMETADATA");
00158   if (grpNode == NULL)
00159   {
00160     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00161   }
00162 
00163   objNode = FindObject(grpNode, (char *)param, NULL);
00164   if (objNode == NULL)
00165   {
00166     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00167   }
00168 
00169   parmNode = FindParameter(objNode, "VALUE"); 
00170   if (parmNode == NULL)
00171   {
00172     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
00173   }
00174 
00175   valueNode = FirstValue(parmNode);
00176  
00177   /* copy the value string(s) into user provided string */
00178   if (valueNode->item.type == TV_STRING  || valueNode->item.type == TV_SYMBOL)
00179   {
00180     md.data.s = (char**)calloc(valueNode->parameter->value_count,sizeof(char*));
00181     md.num_values = valueNode->parameter->value_count;
00182     if (md.data.s == NULL)
00183        MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00184             
00185     md.dataptr = md.data.s;
00186     md.datatype = MTKMETA_CHAR;
00187     strPtr1 = md.data.s;
00188     while (valueNode != NULL)
00189     {
00190       *strPtr1 = (char*)malloc((strlen(valueNode->item.value.string) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00191       if (*strPtr1 == NULL)
00192     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00193 
00194       strcpy(*strPtr1, valueNode->item.value.string);
00195       strPtr1++;
00196       valueNode = NextValue(valueNode);
00197     }
00198   }   
00199   else if (valueNode->item.type == TV_INTEGER)
00200   {
00201     md.data.i = (int*)malloc(valueNode->parameter->value_count * sizeof(int));
00202     md.num_values = valueNode->parameter->value_count;
00203     if (md.data.i == NULL)
00204       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00205             
00206     md.dataptr = md.data.i;
00207     md.datatype = MTKMETA_INT;
00208     intPtr = md.data.i;
00209     while (valueNode != NULL)
00210     {
00211       *intPtr = (int)valueNode->item.value.integer.number; 
00212       intPtr++;
00213       valueNode = NextValue(valueNode);
00214     }
00215   }
00216   else 
00217   {    
00218     md.data.d = (double*)malloc(valueNode->parameter->value_count * sizeof(double));
00219     md.num_values = valueNode->parameter->value_count;
00220     if (md.data.d == NULL)
00221       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00222 
00223     md.dataptr = md.data.d;
00224     md.datatype = MTKMETA_DOUBLE;
00225     dblPtr = md.data.d;
00226     while (valueNode != NULL)
00227     {
00228       *dblPtr = (double)valueNode->item.value.real.number; 
00229       dblPtr++;
00230       valueNode = NextValue(valueNode);
00231     }
00232   }
00233   
00234   /* Destroy tree */
00235   RemoveAggregate(aggNode);
00236 
00237   /* Copy data to output */
00238   metadata->data.s = md.data.s;
00239   metadata->num_values = md.num_values;
00240   metadata->datatype = md.datatype;
00241   metadata->dataptr = md.dataptr;
00242 
00243   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00244 
00245 ERROR_HANDLE:
00246   RemoveAggregate(aggNode);
00247 
00248   if (temp != NULL)
00249     fclose(temp);
00250 
00251   if (coremeta != NULL)
00252     free(coremeta);
00253 
00254   MtkCoreMetaDataFree(&md);
00255 
00256   return status_code;
00257 }
